title: Thank you...
name: Thank you...
description:
A Map by Doublezy

Thank someone(s) in an unexpected way. Share your thanks, spread the word, share the love!

properties.name: 704 Comm Ave.
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy704 Commonwealth Ave, Boston, MA...for introducing me to the work of Colette, Marilynne Robinson, and Jeanette Winterson.

properties.name: Academy of Art University
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 79 New Montgomery St, San Francisco, CA...for being my first point of contact at the Academy and and excellent resource full of positive energy.

properties.name: Alameda, CA
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 2201 Encinal Ave, Alameda, CA...for being a hell of a friend. I love you to pieces!! ...for showing me the Pacific Ocean for the first time. ...for sharing your oh-so-lovable pets. ...for being a wise Greek philosopher. (Can\'t forget that.) And thank you to this lovely lady\'s family and friends, who make me feel so welcome whenever I\'m in the neighborhood: JN-F, JF, JM, K, R, A, KA, AV, MW, SM.

properties.name: Athens, Greece
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Athens, Greece..., G, for being the most interesting person I\'ve ever met on the bus. You were a good storyteller. Did you rejoin the Greek army?

properties.name: Berklee College of Music
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy  1140 Boylston Street, Boston, MA...for being fun and charismatic and fascinating. You were the lead singer of a band. ...for writing that song about me -- at least I think it was about me. You would never admit it, though, because you "don\'t write songs about girls." ...for offering me your coat on that chilly night. It was about ten sizes too big, and I looked ridiculous in it, but I was warm.

properties.name: Brookline Booksmith
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy279 Harvard St, Brookline, MA...for writing. You\'re my favorite author. You write from the heart, the gut. You get it. ...for the fantastic reading you did here (at the Booksmith) in summer \'05. I especially enjoyed "Appropriate Sex." You signed my book. I couldn\'t believe how handsome you were in person.

properties.name: Brooklyn
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy  Brooklyn, NY ..., RN EG PB, for good times in Brooklyn: sharing stories about my Fung Wah trips, my makeshift toga on the subway, Itchy/Scratchy/Krusty/Socrates ("Uh, what\'s that?"), dive bars, weird mixed drinks, late nights, pizza-eating contest, the huge couch-bed, the faux poetry slam ("a place where the word lexicon is not part of my lexicon"), hot summer days, "THAT BIRD IS A LIIAHH," sleeping late, French press coffee, eggs and fresh muffins, lots of photos, camera love and camera shy, windy cab, general madness.

properties.name: Buffalo, NY
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy   Buffalo, NY..., dear family. Where do I begin? You are love; you are my core, my roots, my rock. ..., neighbors and family friends and best Buffalo girlfriends, for your support and love through the years. You were there through it all. You continue to be there. You\'re family. Sending my love to all of you across 3,000 miles...

properties.name: CFA
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy855 Commonwealth Ave, Boston, MA...for seeing a spark in me.

properties.name: COM
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 640 Commonwealth Ave, Boston, MA..., my Design Center boss-buddy and co-workers. How was I fortunate enough to get PAID for the fun I had in that office? I would\'ve done it for free. You\'re aces, all of you: SN, ER, AB, AA, CW, TG, KC. (AR: Thanks for the Saturday PhotoShop bootcamp.) And Rich: So glad I met you through COM. You\'re a pleasure to do business with and an all-around fantastic guy. Thanks for the above-and-beyond work you did with those Red Sox projects. ..., my fomer advisees. I wasn\'t your PA for long, but I remember you -- each one of you -- and your enthusiasm. It was beautiful. ..., COM friends, advisors, and professors, for the collaboration, motivation, and inspiration.

properties.name: Chelsea Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy  222 West 23rd St, New York, NY...for bringing me here. The art, the vibes, the ruby slipper sighting (thinking of that still gives me shivers -- in a good way), the history you can feel, the David Lynch-esque encounter. Too cool, really.

properties.name: Columbus, OH
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyColumbus, OH...for sharing your drawings. Your work brings my first major laugh of the workday.

properties.name: Dallas Morning News
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyYoung St, Dallas, TX...for always sharing your updated words (the articles) and images (the Kodak slideshows!). ...for your vibrancy. You LOVE, LOVE, LOVE life. Talking to you is invigorating.

properties.name: Darien Lake
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Darien Center, NY 14040...for three summers\' worth of memories and farmer\'s tans -- and getting to wear a teal polo shirt with a purple collar. *Is* there a better summer gig?! From rockin\' the cat rack to crazy color to "BINGO WITH LIGHTS," it was a damn good time. Thanks to: JK, SK, BriK, BobK, MC, SC, MM, CD, MD, PD, JT, JP, KB, J, J, B.

properties.name: Dosa Place
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 13812 Red Hill Avenue, Tustin, CA 92680The dosas from Dosa Place are delicious. Dosas are like crepes but crispier. You can eat them with slightly mashed potatoes, chicken or various curries. Thanks for taking me here and ordering too much food (but I didn\'t mind). You introduced us to the friendly host using a Spanish version of your name, Graciela.

properties.name: Erie, PA
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyErie, PA...for treating her right. She deserves nothing but the best.

properties.name: Eugene, OR
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Eugene, OR...for the delicious meals, the comfy couch, the laughter, the relaxing weekends, and the company of two very sweet and entertaining kittens.

properties.name: Jim and Patty's Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy  5015 NE Fremont St, Portland, OR...for taking the time to sit down and chat with me that day over coffee and chai (I know you are incredibly busy). I loved your stories about NYC and MTV. You were one of the first people I met in Portland.

properties.name: Kenmore West
Lake Oswego, OR
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Boones Ferry Road, Lake Oswego, OR...for welcoming me into your beautiful home -- my first home in Oregon. ...for the laughs at our happy hour get-togethers.

properties.name: London, England
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyLondon...for your hospitality and generosity in London. You made it possible for me to say, "You know, I lived on Abbey Road for a week." I still can\'t get over how cool that was.

properties.name: Loretto Hall
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy400 The Fenway, Boston, MA...for being the heart of my freshman year memories. ...for four floors\' worth of wonderfully insane freshmen. ...for the shuttle and our awesome drivers, George (always smiling) and Jim (always hilarious, sometimes disgruntled, sometimes singing Bob Marley). Kids, we\'ll always have Loretto: SG, HC, SV, RN, JO, J(D)B, MBS, PD, EG, EW, MP, SG, KP, KZ, LM, AD, CS, DC...and so many more.

properties.name: Maddox Building
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy1231 NW Hoyt St, Portland OR...for being colleagues and neighbors who (whom? Let me know, editors!) I look forward to seeing each day. I could\'ve landed anywhere for my first job in PDX; how lucky I am to have landed here. 205 Planners -- BH, BB, MRM, WD, SS, CH -- you\'re peaches! The bee\'s knees! ...for the creative energy you all contribute to this floor. You can feel it in the air. ...for the folks and pets who add an extra dose of sunshine to my day (with special thanks to Liz and Timmy, Susan and Zoe).

properties.name: Martha's Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyEdgartown, MA 02539...for inviting me to your sister\'s wedding party on the Vineyard. Miscellaneous memories: drinking the light summer red in big glasses, lots of paper lanterns, the outdoor shower, sweet Riley, your mom\'s hydrangeas.

properties.name: NESOP
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy537 Commonwealth Ave, Boston, MA...for the fun photo shoot last summer. Someday soon I\'ll let you know which prints I want. I should scan the contact sheets and post some images here. That\'d be cooler than this clipart camera.

properties.name: NYC
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy5th Ave, New York, NY...for the hilarious blog.

properties.name: Newtown, PA
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyNewtown, PA...for the job offer in winter \'04. We lived together for almost a week; isn\'t that funny? Remember the purple walls (of course you do) at the office? Shopping for posters? (You) driving so fast that I couldn\'t bear to keep my eyes open? Your house was gorgeous, and your mom\'s butternut squash soup is still the best I\'ve ever tasted. You should tell her that.

properties.name: Niagara Falls - the Canadian side
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyNiagara Falls, Canada...for dinner and a movie in Canada. You were such a trip. You had too many beers that night and told me you would marry me. I laughed. You took too long to get ready -- and were too into hair products. The Casino Niagara security gig was right up your alley. I think you\'re a policeman now. Where are you?

properties.name: Nicholas' Restaurant - YUUM!
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 318 SE Grand Ave, Portland, OR...for treating me to dinner the other night. You\'re a true sweetheart. I look up to you; do you know that? (Now you do.) ...for being there to experience the strangeness with me. "IT\'S THE BEAR!!!!" Good grief.

properties.name: Nigeria
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Nigeria..., Professor, for one of the most enjoyable courses I took at BU. Thank you for bringing Nigeria to life; it\'s a country I knew very little about before your class. You were a great storyteller, and your warm, calming voice was a nice break in an otherwise stressful day of classes.

properties.name: Niketown Beantown
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 200 Newbury St, Boston, MA..., RF/JF/HC, for bringing me in to help with the marathon setup. Good times, free shoes! ...and for the 21st birthday celebration.

properties.name: Niketown PTown
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy SW Sixth Avenue, Portland, OR...for being my Oregon home-base homegirl. You\'ve done so much for me. (1/27 rules.)

properties.name: Nob Hill, SF
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyNob Hill, San Francisco...for what we had. We\'re over -- so very, absolutely over. You think I\'ll call in a few weeks. I won\'t. And you won\'t notice that I edited this.

properties.name: PLAY-shul
properties.description: Posted by Baostar...for a small, beautifully-wrapped package I found on my doorstep. I didn\'t what it was until I opened it to find a hand-painted insect for all the bug catches I found and a note from Tracy. Thanks, you guys are absolutely awesome!

properties.name: POPheadquarters
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy132 Ipswich Street, Boston, MA...for being an almost too-good-to-be-true group of co-workers: a collection of designers, software architects, administrative partners in crime, account execs, sound engineers, (the list goes on...) whose talent, dedication, and senses of humor blew me away. ...for being part of the madness! What a ride, my friends. ...for Rocco, the sweetest pooch ever. May he rest in peace.

properties.name: Saint Paul St.
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Saint Paul Street, Brookline, MA..., SG, for living with me twice during college and twice after college. We went through a lot together. ..., SG, for the times we sat in that beautiful, sunny living room eating Cookin\' for breakfast or too-expensive (but ridiculously delicious) Fugakyu for dinner while watching digital cable. Or drinking two buck chuck. Shows of choice: Six Feet Under, SATC, Nip/Tuck...and Laguna Beach reruns. Oh, Laguna. ..., DS, for all the flowers you contributed to the apartment, for hanging our mini-blinds, sharing meals when I was down, and, most importantly, for making this incredible woman so happy.

properties.name: Sox Foundation
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy4 Yawkey Way, Boston, MA..., MV and LS, for inspiring me with your dedication. You\'re outstanding women. Superwomen, I\'d say. ...for the opportunities that became special memories: Opening Day at Fenway, the Welcome Home Dinner, the Fever Pitch Premiere. Somewhere down the line, these\'ll be stories for the grandkids. ...for the most beautiful (and the largest!) arrangment of flowers I have ever received.

properties.name: Summer '03 sublet
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy  76 Egmont Street, Brookline, MA...for subletting me that GORGEOUS apartment. Great location, tree-lined street, tons of sunlight, the long hallway, the green carpet runners: It was a lovely place to spend my first summer out of college.

properties.name: TT the Bear's
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy10 Brookline St, Cambridge, MA...for embracing air and ROCKING. ...for putting on an awesome NNP show here last summer. Wait, that was back when you were LSC.

properties.name: Thank You Mr. Seversen
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  819 N 25th St, Fort Dodge, IAFor helping me make it through High School.

properties.name: Trident
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy338 Newbury Street, Boston, MA...for the gazillion laughs at the register, the independent minds, the coolest mag rack out there, the after-work drinks at Bukowski\'s/Sonsie/Summer Shack/DeVille, the cozy Sundays. ..., BF, for one of the nicest (and most unexpected) compliments I have ever received. I\'ll never forget it. Y\'all have a special place in my heart: JB, KS, LS, DW, R, A, N, J, JC, JS, WD.

properties.name: Try-it
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy  4155 Walden Ave, Lancaster, NY...for being a patient and super-fun boss. ...for your gameshow host voice ("Thaaat\'s amaaazing") and velociraptor impression. Too funny. ...for trusting me with the sign shop for your honeymoon week and saying you knew I\'d do fine. And I did. :-)

properties.name: Tuesdays
properties.description: Posted by DoublezySE Morrison, Portland, OR...for Tuesday evenings. ...for introducing me to Michael Leunig\'s work.

properties.name: Valencia Street Books
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 569 Valencia Street, San Francisco, CA..., SWH, for spilling. Your art gives me strength. Wish I could\'ve made it to your reading here in April.

properties.name: Vancouver, WA
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyVancouver, WA...for helping me through, for believing in me. You told me it would be OK. You were right. How can I thank you enough?

properties.name: Westford, MA
properties.description: Posted by DoublezyWestford, MA...for sharing Sherlock! ...for the above-and-beyond favor you did for me. ...for your kindness, generosity, and grace. I am blessed to know you.

properties.name: Winthrop, MA
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy Winthrop, MA...for being absolutely, positively, 100% chock-full of joy and positive energy. You inspire me. I love you dearly. ...for the IHOP hangs and the Chelsea Hotel experiences. (Remember the ruby slippers?!) *23*
